CustomField.description: The API name of the doc assembly rule static field set associated with the business object. The list of static fields are used as pre-filters to retrieve rules associated with the rule set during the dynamic assembly process.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The API name of the doc assembly rule static field set associated with the business object. The list of static fields are used as pre-filters to retrieve rules associated with the rule set during the dynamic assembly process.
CustomField.label: Doc Assembly Rule Static FieldSet Name
